nodes.name: Webhook Trigger - Booking Request
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Accept booking requests from Module 01 or direct booking forms.
INPUTS: JSON with contact_id, email, name, phone, preferred_date, preferred_time, service_type.
OUTPUTS: Parsed body as $json.
CONFIG: Set ALLOWED_ORIGINS for CORS, WEBHOOK_ID_BOOKING for custom path.
INTEGRATION: Connects to Module 01 output or standalone booking widget.

nodes.name: Validate Booking Data
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Enforce data quality before scheduling API calls.
INPUTS: Webhook body with patient and booking details.
OUTPUTS: Routes to 'true' if valid, 'false' for validation errors.
VALIDATION: Email format, required fields (name, phone, service_type).
NOTE: preferred_date/time are optional; scheduling system will suggest if missing.

parameters.responseBody: ={{ { "success": false, "error": "Missing or invalid required fields: email, name, phone, service_type", "timestamp": $now.toISO() } }}

nodes.name: Return Validation Error
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return 400 error when booking data is incomplete or invalid.
INPUTS: Triggered by validation failure.
OUTPUTS: HTTP 400 with error JSON.
ERROR HANDLING: Clear message to client, no PHI exposure.

nodes.name: Check Scheduling Availability
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Query scheduling system (Cal.com/Acuity/SimplyBook) for available time slots.
INPUTS: Validated booking request with preferred date/time.
OUTPUTS: Array of available slots or next available time.
CONFIG: SCHEDULING_API_BASE_URL, SCHEDULING_EVENT_TYPE_ID, CLINIC_TIMEZONE.
ALTERNATES: Swap for Cal.com node, Acuity Scheduling node, or custom API.
NOTE: If preferred_date missing, checks next 7 days from tomorrow.

nodes.name: Select Best Time Slot
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Intelligently select appointment time based on patient preference and availability.
INPUTS: Available slots from scheduling API + patient preferred date/time.
OUTPUTS: selected_slot object with time, id, duration, plus 3 alternative slots.
LOGIC: If patient specified time, find closest match; otherwise use first available.
ERROR: Returns error object if no slots available, includes retry_after date.
CUSTOMIZATION: Modify logic for business rules (e.g., buffer times, provider preferences).

parameters.name: responses
metadata

nodes.name: Create Booking in Scheduling System
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create confirmed appointment in scheduling system (Cal.com/Acuity/SimplyBook).
INPUTS: Selected time slot + patient details from webhook.
OUTPUTS: Booking confirmation with appointment_id, booking URL, calendar invite.
CONFIG: SCHEDULING_API_BASE_URL, SCHEDULING_EVENT_TYPE_ID for service/provider mapping.
METADATA: Includes Module 01 contact_id for cross-module tracking.
ALTERNATES: Replace with Cal.com node, Acuity node, or Google Calendar API.
TIMEOUT: 15s to accommodate external calendar sync delays.

nodes.name: Update CRM with Booking Status
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Update CRM contact record with appointment details and status.
INPUTS: Booking confirmation from scheduling system + contact_id from Module 01.
OUTPUTS: Updated CRM contact object.
FIELDS UPDATED: appointment_status, appointment_date, appointment_id, lifecycle_stage.
STATUS PROGRESSION: Moves contact from 'lead' to 'opportunity' stage.
ALTERNATES: Swap for Salesforce, Zoho, or custom CRM API.
ERROR HANDLING: If contact_id missing, creates CRM activity instead of contact update.

nodes.name: Send SMS Confirmation
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Send immediate SMS confirmation to patient with appointment details.
INPUTS: Booking confirmation + patient phone from webhook.
OUTPUTS: Twilio message SID and delivery status.
CONFIG: TWILIO_FROM_NUMBER (clinic's Twilio number), CLINIC_NAME, CLINIC_PHONE.
MESSAGE CONTENT: Friendly greeting, date/time, location, booking ID, reschedule option.
ALTERNATES: Replace with SendGrid (email), WhatsApp Business API, or Vonage SMS.
COMPLIANCE: Ensure patient opted in for SMS communications (TCPA).

parameters.subject: =Appointment Confirmed - {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.start || $json.startTime).toFormat('MMM d, yyyy') }}
parameters.message:
=

Appointment Confirmed

Hi {{ $('Webhook Trigger - Booking Request').first().json.body.name.split(' ')[0] }},

Your appointment has been successfully scheduled. We look forward to seeing you!

Service
{{ $('Webhook Trigger - Booking Request').first().json.body.service_type }}
Date & Time
{{ DateTime.fromISO($json.start || $json.startTime).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy') }} at {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.start || $json.startTime).toFormat('h:mm a') }}
Location
{{ $env.CLINIC_NAME }}
{{ $env.CLINIC_ADDRESS || '' }}
Booking ID
{{ ($json.id || $json.uid) }}
Reschedule Appointment

Need to cancel or have questions?
Call us at {{ $env.CLINIC_PHONE }} or reply to this email.

{{ $env.CLINIC_NAME }}
{{ $env.CLINIC_PHONE }} | {{ $env.CLINIC_EMAIL }}

This is an automated message. Please do not reply directly to this email.

nodes.name: Send Email Confirmation
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Send branded email confirmation with appointment details and calendar invite.
INPUTS: Booking confirmation + patient email.
OUTPUTS: SendGrid message ID and delivery status.
CONFIG: SENDGRID_FROM_EMAIL, BRAND_PRIMARY_COLOR for template customization.
FEATURES: Responsive HTML template, reschedule button, clinic branding.
OPTIONS: BCC to clinic email (SENDGRID_BCC_EMAIL), optional .ics attachment.
ALTERNATES: Swap for Mailgun, AWS SES, or Microsoft Graph (Outlook).
COMPLIANCE: Includes unsubscribe footer if ENABLE_UNSUBSCRIBE=true.

nodes.name: Merge All Confirmations
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Consolidate outputs from CRM update, SMS, and email into single response.
INPUTS: CRM update status, SMS delivery status, email delivery status.
OUTPUTS: Unified confirmation object with all delivery metadata.
USE CASE: Provides comprehensive delivery report for webhook response and audit logs.

parameters.responseBody:
={{ {
  "success": true,
  "message": "Appointment booked successfully",
  "appointment_id": $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.id || $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.uid,
  "patient_email": $('Webhook Trigger - Booking Request').first().json.body.email,
  "patient_name": $('Webhook Trigger - Booking Request').first().json.body.name,
  "scheduled_time": $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.start || $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.startTime,
  "scheduled_time_formatted": DateTime.fromISO($('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.start || $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.startTime).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy \\at h:mm a'),
  "service_type": $('Webhook Trigger - Booking Request').first().json.body.service_type,
  "channel": $env.SCHEDULING_PROVIDER_NAME || 'Cal.com',
  "booking_url": $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.bookingUrl || $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.url,
  "reschedule_url": $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.rescheduleUrl || ($env.SCHEDULING_BASE_URL + '/reschedule/' + ($('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.id || $('Create Booking in Scheduling System').first().json.uid)),
  "metadata": {
    "crm_updated": $('Update CRM with Booking Status').first().json.id ? true : false,
    "sms_sent": $('Send SMS Confirmation').first().json.sid ? true : false,
    "email_sent": $('Send Email Confirmation').first().json.messageId ? true : false,
    "sms_sid": $('Send SMS Confirmation').first().json.sid || null,
    "email_message_id": $('Send Email Confirmation').first().json.messageId || null
  },
  "timestamp": $now.toISO()
} }}

nodes.name: Return Success Response
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return standardized appointment_status.json to caller.
INPUTS: Merged confirmation data from all channels.
OUTPUTS: HTTP 200 with appointment details, URLs, and delivery metadata.
FORMAT: Includes appointment_id for Module 03 (reminders), formatted time for display.
METADATA: Delivery confirmation for CRM, SMS, email with message IDs for tracking.
INTEGRATION: Output can trigger Module 03 (Appointment Reminders) or Module 04 (Pre-Visit Forms).

nodes.name: Check for Slot Selection Errors
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Detect when no time slots are available in requested timeframe.
INPUTS: Slot selection output with potential error flag.
OUTPUTS: Routes to error response if error=true, continues to booking if no error.
ERROR HANDLING: Provides alternative dates in error response for better UX.

nodes.name: Return No Availability Error
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Handle scenario where no appointment slots are available.
INPUTS: Error object from slot selection with retry_after date.
OUTPUTS: HTTP 409 (Conflict) with retry date and clinic contact info.
UX IMPROVEMENT: Provides actionable next steps (retry date, alternative contact methods).
CLIENT HANDLING: Frontend can auto-retry after retry_after date or prompt manual booking.

nodes.name: Error Handler
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Catch execution errors (API failures, network issues) and prevent workflow crash.
INPUTS: Any upstream error from scheduling API, CRM, SMS, or email nodes.
OUTPUTS: Error details for logging service.
BEST PRACTICE: Connect to error notification workflow or logging service in production.
RECOVERY: Can trigger fallback actions (e.g., save to queue for manual processing).

meta.description: Aigent Universal Clinic Template - Module 02: Consult Booking & Scheduling. Accepts booking requests from Module 01 or direct input, checks availability in scheduling system (Cal.com/Acuity/SimplyBook), creates appointment, updates CRM, sends SMS and email confirmations. Returns standardized appointment_status.json for downstream modules.
meta.author: Aigent Automation Engineering
